summary: 调用SubmitEmailVerification接口发送邮箱验证邮件。

schema.description:
接口返回错误信息语言。取值：
- **zh**：中文。
- **en**：英文。

默认值为**en**。
需要完成验证的邮箱，多个邮箱之间使用英文逗号（,）隔开。

验证邮件已经存在时是否重新发送邮件。取值：

- **true**：重新发送验证邮件。
- **false**：不重新发送验证邮件。

默认值为**false**。

ExistList.description: 验证邮件已经存在列表。

Message.example: The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded.

SuccessList.description: 验证邮件发送成功列表。

FailList.description: 验证邮件发送失败列表。

Message.example: The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "E2A8A5EF-DF8A-4C48-8FD4-9F6BD71AB26D", "ExistList": [ { "Email": "username@example.com", "Code": "SendTokenQuotaExceeded", "Message": "The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded." } ], "SuccessList": [ { "Email": "username@example.com", "Code": "Success", "Message": "Success" } ], "FailList": [ { "Email": "username@example.com", "Code": "SendTokenQuotaExceeded", "Message": "The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded" } ] }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"E2A8A5EF-DF8A-4C48-8FD4-9F6BD71AB26D username@example.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded. SendTokenQuotaExceeded username@example.com Success Success username@example.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded SendTokenQuotaExceeded ","errorExample":" aaa@test.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded. SendTokenQuotaExceeded E2A8A5EF-DF8A-4C48-8FD4-9F6BD71AB26D ccc@test.com ddd@test.com "}]
title: 发送邮箱验证邮件
description: 收到验证邮件后您需要在3天内登录邮箱完成验证。如果验证邮件已过期，您可以调用[ResendEmailVerification](~~67734~~)接口重新发送验证邮件。
